item.description:
Alright boys, as we all know, Valentine's is coming up. The perfect night to meet a single girl who is pissed off about being single on such a "Romantic Night" (or atleast that's what Hallmark tells them.) So here's the proposal...

Sin City
195 Freight St
Waterbury, CT 06702
http://www.myspace.co...

Sat. Night is their Valentine's Day Dance Party (working on specific details for drink specials and such)

This is where we should go. Different location for all of us to do some sinning.

Working on getting us VIP Line at the moment.

Who's down?
item.how_to_find_us: IM me for details jcidol@luckymail.com on AIM or contact Sergey's cell
item.name: 2/14/09 - Saturday Night - Sin City - Valentine's Day
